nodes.bodyText: should the function name be reduce?
Shall we move the METADATA as a post fix with these constant names?
Let's change to StrandData by moving name inside StrandMetadata class

For workers strand name is read at runtime hence we cannot moved to Strand metadata class which is constant at compiler time. So I have keep the name as it is since they are actually metadata. Added the private vars and getters to StrandMetadata class
